Articles.Content:
Hey all. It's just a question, so I'll be quick.

I installed RSSVE, but is it compatible with scatterer and planetshine? I found scatterer and planetshine by default, not rss configuration. So I am afraid of make my game crash or textures incompatible.

 

Any idea?
You should probably find the threads for those particular mods and ask your questions there.  You're likely to get better support if you do that.
